pages.title: Rosyuo's Helheim City
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Gaim (2013, TV show)$(br2)Spawns throughout Helheim$(br2)Includes suspicious gravel$(br2)Includes a $(l:misc/blocks/boss_blocks#rosyuo_boss_block)Rosyuo Boss Block$(/l)

Suspicious gravel drops:$(li)1 $(l:gaim/arsenal/gaim_horse_armor)Gaim Horse Armor$(/l) (16.7%)$(li)1 $(l:gaim/items/lockseeds#kabi_orange_lockseed)Kabi Orange Lockseed$(/l) (16.7%)$(li)1 $(l:gaim/items/helheim_fruit)Helheim Fruit$(/l) (33.3%)$(li)1 $(l:gaim/items/himawari_lockseed)Himawari Lockseed$(/l) (33.3%)
